short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add fun christmas themed elements to your web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This delightful extension brings festive vibes to your browsing experience! Enjoy a magical snowfall effect and playful random emojis. The extension also features background music alternating between two cheerful tracks to keep the holiday spirit alive. Easily toggle the effects on or off with a single click.
